content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Email communication Trend Vision One™ – Cloud Risk Management supports notifications sent via Email. Set up an Email channel Click on Create another Email channel Set automatic notifications Configure Triggers Configure Users Copy communication settings Note Active users without an email will not appear on the recipient list. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated.
